title: Frontend Developer
summary: As a Front-End developer, I was responsible for bringing the CEO's vision for Timbre to life. My tech-stack for this role included React Native, Expo, and JavaScript.

title: Software Engineer Intern
summary: As a Software Engineer Intern, I developed new features for Parfé's growing user base! My tech-stack for this role included Swift, Ruby on Rails, and Adobe XD for UI mockups and design!

title: Software Test Engineer II
summary: As a Software Test Engineer II at Qualtrics, I was more heavily involved with cross-team projects, including product wide shadow testing, and web-crawling test frameworks.

title: Software Test Engineer I
summary: As a Software Test Engineer at Qualtrics, I drove QE practices within my development team. This involves designing test plans, contributing to test frameworks and developing release pipelines.
